item.title: Light painting with pixelstick
item.description:
Light painting with pixelstick

More info at thepixelstick.com! We spent the last year building pixelstick, a light painting tool capable of everything from photo-real renders to amazing abstract ribbons. We've improved with every iteration and are excited to finally show off what it can do. Everything was shot by just two slightly sleep deprived guys and one Pixelstick in Brooklyn.

item.title: RADEN Smart Luggage
item.description:
RADEN Smart Luggage

The plot might be familiar: a young start-up disrupts big, sleepy industry that nobody young wants to touch-but the ending is sweet and actually, available to purchase on the day of its launch.

item.title: A Clever Headrest That Could Make Flying Actually Bearable
item.description:
A Clever Headrest That Could Make Flying Actually Bearable

There are many reasons to hate flying economy. The tiny seats, the inedible food, the fees airlines charge for things you'd get for free in a medieval dungeon. Manon KÃ¼hne can't fix any of that, but she's has found one small way to make sitting in 17C just a bit less hellish.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.

item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...

item.title: How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money
item.description:
How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money

How to successfully book your first-choice listings and get them for cheaper.

item.title: Coming clean: Dirty Lemon makes detoxing a little easier.
item.description:
Coming clean: Dirty Lemon makes detoxing a little easier.

Chances are you've heard the detoxifying benefits of ingesting lemon and water extolled on more than one occasion, but drinking the stuff has just become a whole lot easier with the launch of Dirty Lemon, a new line of detox beverages built upon this basic principle.

item.title: eero: No More Internet Dead Zones
item.description:
eero: No More Internet Dead Zones

Nearly all homes have a WiFi dead zone: you never get messages in the kitchen, you can't watch Netflix in the bedroom, you can't FaceTime in the backyard. This is simply because most of us have one WiFi router for our entire home, and that just doesn't work for how we use Internet today.
